path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - World of Masters Smartcontracts - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Redundant fallback function
findings.description: The contract contains a redundant fallback function which can lead to unnecessary gas consumption and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unsafe type Inference
findings.description: The finding indicates potential issues with type inference in the smart contract code.

findings.title: Explicit visibility of functions state variables (external, internal, private and public)
findings.description: Functions or state variables with explicit visibility modifiers can lead to unintended access or modifications.
